summary: "Oldboy" is a 2003 South Korean action-thriller film directed by Park Chan-wook. It tells the story of Oh Dae-su, who is imprisoned for 15 years without knowing why. After his release, he seeks revenge against his captor and falls in love with a sushi chef. The film received critical acclaim, winning awards and earning praise for its action sequences. It was adapted from a Japanese manga and inspired remakes, including an American version in 2013. "Oldboy" is considered one of the greatest films and has appeared on many "best-of" lists.
title: Oldboy (2003 film)
